name: C.A.R.L. (greymouth)
description:
NOTE ON BROWSER BUILD: There is an issue with the background images on the web version. It is playable on browser (but not super pretty) so please download for fuller experience. I'm continuing efforts to fix this and will update if I am able to fix.

In C.A.R.L. jump to the beat of the music and control the rate time flows for obstacles!

Credits:

SpookyBee - Game/Level Design

fooyoosong - Music

Greymouth - Code

Controls:
JUMP - SPACE

SLOW TIME - X
